name: LANDER 1949 edition
description:
LANDER 1949 edition is an experimental mini-game created in Poly Engine during 3 days gamejam in Trnava 2021. Control simulated space rocket on old-school computer and learn something new from the history!

The main goal was to test our custom 2D engine called Poly Engine and to know its boundaries. More about Poly Engine here.

Thank you all for playing and we hope you will like this mini-game!
With love, Struct9.
